message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be worth more than that to you.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $13500 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get closer to my asking price.  How about $13750? This would still be a great deal for you, and it allows us to both walk away happy. What do you say?
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $13600 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to me.
